text: The men's 4 × 364 metres relay event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 9 March in Madrid. Each athlete ran two laps of the 182 metres track. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font- size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Waldemar Korycki Jan Balachowski Jan Werner Andrzej Badeński || 2:48.9 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Horst Daverkausen Peter Bernreuther Ingo Roper Martin Jellinghaus || 2:49.7 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Boris Savchuk Vasyl Anisimov Sergey Abalichin Aleksandr Bratchikov || 2:51.1 || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1968 European Indoor Games – Men's 4 × 364 metres relay
